Chan Wai Shing

Method Detail

downloadPatches

public static DownloadPatchesResult downloadPatches(DownloadPatchesListener listener,
                                                    java.lang.String clientScriptPath,
                                                    java.util.List<Patch> patches,
                                                    int retryTimes,
                                                    int retryDelay)
                                             throws InvalidFormatException,
                                                    java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
Download specified patches and update the client script.

Parameters:
listener - the download patch listener listen to progress and result
clientScriptPath - the file path of the client script
patches - the patches to download
retryTimes - total number of times to retry
retryDelay - the time to delay before each retry
Returns:
the download result
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - the format of the client script is invalid
java.net.MalformedURLException - any one URL of patches is invalid
java.io.IOException - error occurred when reading the client script

downloadPatches

public static DownloadPatchesResult downloadPatches(DownloadPatchesListener listener,
                                                    java.io.File clientScriptFile,
                                                    Client clientScript,
                                                    java.util.List<Patch> patches,
                                                    int retryTimes,
                                                    int retryDelay)
                                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Download specified patches and update the client script.

Parameters:
listener - the download patch listener listen to progress and result
clientScriptFile - the file of the client script
clientScript - the client script content/object
patches - the patches to download
retryTimes - total number of times to retry
retryDelay - the time to delay before each retry
Returns:
the download result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - any one URL of patches is invalid

downloadPatches

public static DownloadPatchesResult downloadPatches(DownloadPatchesListener listener,
                                                    java.util.List<Patch> patches,
                                                    java.lang.String storagePath,
                                                    int retryTimes,
                                                    int retryDelay)
                                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Download specified patches and update the client script.

Parameters:
listener - the download patch listener listen to progress and result
storagePath - the path for storage temporary files
patches - the patches to download
retryTimes - total number of times to retry
retryDelay - the time to delay before each retry
Returns:
the download result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - any one URL of patches is invalid

getPatch

public static DownloadResult getPatch(DownloadProgressListener listener,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.io.File saveToFile,
                                      java.lang.String fileSHA256,
                                      int expectedLength,
                                      int retryTimes,
                                      int retryDelay)
                               throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Get the patch from the Internet. This will check the exist file in the path of saveToFile and determine resume download.

Parameters:
listener - the progress listener
url - the URL to download the patch from
saveToFile - the place to save the downloaded patch
fileSHA256 - the SHA-256 digest of the patch
expectedLength - the expected file length of the patch
retryTimes - total number of times to retry
retryDelay - the time to delay before each retry
Returns:
the get patch result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - url is not a valid HTTP URL

getSuitablePatches

public static java.util.List<Patch> getSuitablePatches(Catalog catalog,
                                                       java.lang.String currentVersion,
                                                       boolean acceptOnlyFullPack)
Determine the suitable patches to download to upgrade the current version of software to highest possible version with least download size.

Parameters:
catalog - the patches catalog
currentVersion - the current software version
acceptOnlyFullPack - true to accept only full pack patches, false to accept both patch (diff/partly) and full pack patches.
Returns:
the list of suitable patches

getSuitablePatches

public static java.util.List<Patch> getSuitablePatches(java.util.List<Patch> allPatches,
                                                       java.lang.String fromVersion,
                                                       boolean acceptOnlyFullPack)
Determine the suitable patches to download to upgrade the software with version fromVersion to highest possible version with least download size.

Parameters:
allPatches - all available patches to choose from
fromVersion - the starting version to match
acceptOnlyFullPack - true to accept only full pack patches, false to accept both patch (diff/partly) and full pack patches.
Returns:
the list of suitable patches

calculateTotalLength

protected static long calculateTotalLength(java.util.List<Patch> allPatches)
Calculate the summation of size of all patches in allPatches.

Parameters:
allPatches - the patches list
Returns:
the summation of size of all patches

getUpdatedCatalog

public static Catalog getUpdatedCatalog(java.lang.String clientScriptPath)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        InvalidFormatException
Get the updated catalog.

Parameters:
clientScriptPath - the path of the file of the client script
Returns:
the catalog, null means no newer version of catalog is available
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when reading the client script
InvalidFormatException - the format of the client script is invalid

getUpdatedCatalog

public static Catalog getUpdatedCatalog(Client client)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        InvalidFormatException
Get the updated catalog.

Parameters:
client - the path of the file of the client script
Returns:
the catalog, null means no newer version of catalog is available
Throws:
java.io.IOException - RSA key invalid or error occurred when getting the catalog
InvalidFormatException - the format of the downloaded catalog is invalid

getCatalog

public static DownloadResult getCatalog(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                        java.lang.String url,
                                        long lastUpdateDate,
                                        java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey key,
                                        int keyLength)
                                 throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                        java.io.IOException
Get the catalog from Internet.

Parameters:
out - the stream to output the catalog data to
url - the URL to download the catalog from
lastUpdateDate - the last update date, if the catalog not be updated since this date, the content of the catalog will not be downloaded (save time and traffic); -1 means not specified
key - the RSA key to decrypt the catalog, null means no encryption
keyLength - if key specified, provide the key length of the RSA key in byte
Returns:
the get catalog result
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - url is not a valid HTTP URL
java.io.IOException - catalog content invalid
